name: Timed Panic
description:
Timed Panic was made for the Mini Jam 85 game jam, with the theme of Gold, and a limitation of One-Minute Timer.

During the game you go from room to room defeating enemies and acquiring gold to purchase upgrades to fight the dungeon's boss.

Once you enter a new room you are given one minute to defeat all enemies in the room.

STORY

Some slimes have started living in a dungeon, but the dungeon has had some new intruders come in and take over the place, and just to make matters worse the slimes defensive machines have been targeting the slimes; so the slimes called you in to help fight all the enemies and take back the dungeon.

GOAL

The goal of the game is to get stronger and get to the 60th floor and defeat the dungeon's final boss.

CONTROLS

  • this game uses controller input if a controller is plugged into the computer

Keyboard: use WASD and Arrow Keys to move, use the Mouse to rotate, shoot, and dash.

Controller: Use the joysticks to move and rotate, use the triggers to shoot and dash.
